project.name: RescueAgency
project.description: In this project, I create a backend for the Rescue Agency website. In our application, all the rescue agencies (both the government and private) can register. I have created four modules in this application with two types of logins, one user and another one agency. If any incident happens users can inform agencies using our application and then the agency will solve the incident, if any equipment or any other source is required for the agency, they can directly request help from another agency that is located near the incident area and work together and rescue the peoples. There is a Donate model, if anybody needs blood or any other source, they will post a request that will be visible to everyone who registered in our application. Created a Request Model, this will be useful in times of major incidents like a flood, earthquakes etc.
